name: The Artefact in the Maze
description:
Hello, my name is Márcio and I´m glad that you are here!

**If you like my work, please consider donating any amount you want to support my future projects!**

This is a game (more like a prototype) I made in two days, just to learn a little more about how to make a 3D game. Despite that, besides the time dedicated for coding, the maze, 3d models and soundtrack were made by me. It is, however, working normally and you will be able to enjoy it without any problems! The objective is to escape the labyrinth, and for that you need to find a mysterious sphere that changes places from time to time, before your time runs out! You have only 4 minutes for that. ** TIP: use the arrow keys to move the player **
